entry.title: any title
entry.content:
以下是您提供的内容格式化为Markdown格式：

Journal Papers

Yi Zhang, Lishan Li, Wei Lai, and Xiaoying Xu.
The Influence of Language Loss on Tone Perception: Diminishing Voice Quality Cues in Preserved Tone Contrast.
The Journal of the Acoustical Society of America., Under review.

Conference Proceedings

Yi Zhang, Lishan Li, and Xiaoying Xu.
Individual Differences in Tone Perception and Production in Emerging Dialect: A Case Study of Elementary School Children in Changsha.
In Proc. of Chinese Spoken Language Processing (ISCSLP) 2024 (pp.)., IEEE.

Media

Yi Zhang, Yuqin He, Yixuan Huang.
Analysis of the Current Situation, Problems, and Countermeasures of Reading Education in Changsha Elementary Schools.
Hunan Daily New Media., 2024.2.23.
